data.eml:eml: Studies on Adriaphaenops Noesske with the description of five new species from the Dinarides (Coleoptera: Carabidae: Trechini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lohaj, Roman, Lakota, Ján, Quéinnec, Eric, Pavićević, Dragan, Čeplík, Dávid (2016): Studies on Adriaphaenops Noesske with the description of five new species from the Dinarides (Coleoptera: Carabidae: Trechini). Zootaxa 4205 (6): 501-531, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.200269
